properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. Sal to Santa Cruz Island CA and westward 60 nm including San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 3:50AM PST until January 8 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
combined seas 8 to 10 feet possible when conditions are worst.

* WHERE...Waters from Pt. Sal to Santa Cruz Island CA and
westward 60 nm including San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon
to 3 AM PST Wednesday. For the Gale Watch, from late tonight
through Thursday morning.

* IMPACTS...Potentially strong winds may create dangerous sea
conditions which could capsize or damage small and large
vessels.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and combined
seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
